description:
Saiko Yuki as child, back in the days of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project].
Yuki`s code name "XRP-77" became the name of episode 10 of the TV series.
Yuki`s special ability was precognition and clairvoyance, thus she was able to foresee her own future when staying in the laboratory and decided to run away together with her friends http://anidb.net/ch25793 [Lisa-chan] and http://anidb.net/ch25794 [Hiroko-chan].
name: Yuki-chan
